item.description: Both waterfalls are part of the Trustees of Reservations. Doane's is right off the road. It is a short but STEEP climb back up from the bottom set of falls but well worth it. I haven't been to Royalston Falls but the Trustee's website suggests that the trail is steep and probably pretty muddy. There are additional trails in the area around Tully Lake.
item.why: Doane's Waterfalls are beautiful (see the photos on my profile) & the locals tell me Royalston Falls are even better!
item.name: Check out Doane's Falls & Royalston Falls in Central Mass.
